exmls.content:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="UIPopupMenuSkin" width="182" height="46" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Rect id="listMask" width="182" height="20" y="0" x="0"/>
	<e:Rect id="menuBgMask" width="182" height="20" x="0" y="0"/>
	<e:Image id="menuBg" source="menubg_png" scale9Grid="46,32,92,75" x="0" y="0" mask="menuBgMask"/>
	<e:List id="list" width="182" anchorOffsetX="0" x="0" y="0" mask="listMask"/>
	<e:Button id="menuBtn" label="" anchorOffsetX="0" x="0" y="0">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
			<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="menubtn_png" source.down="menubtn_png"/>
			<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="HomeSceneSkin" width="640" height="1136" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:ns1="*" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Rect left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0" fillAlpha="1" fillColor="0x2a2de0"/>
	<ns1:UIPopupMenu id="popupMenu" x="198" y="269" skinName="UIPopupMenuSkin"/>
	<e:Label id="msgLabel" text="" x="198" y="204" anchorOffsetX="0" width="396" anchorOffsetY="0" height="44"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="ListItemSkin" width="200" height="46" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
	<e:Rect width="200" height="44" fillAlpha="0.1" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Label anchorOffsetX="0" width="182" height="46" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="left" text="{data.itemValue}" x="18" y="0"/>
</e:Skin>
